rdf:Description.dc:title: RDA Work properties
rdf:Description.skos:note: Properties derived from RDA elements and relationship designators with the domain of RDA Work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridged as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that shortens a source work without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that shortens a source work without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.
Œuvre qui raccourcit l’œuvre source sans en changer le sens général ou le mode de présentation.
Una obra que acorta el contenido de la obra fuente sin cambiar el significado general o la manera de presentación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgementOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridgement of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of a source work.
Œuvre qui a été abrégée, c’est-à-dire raccourcie sans changer le sens général ou le mode de présentation de l’œuvre source.
Una obra que ha sido abreviada, i.e., acortada sin cambiar el significado general o manera de presentación de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that incorporates another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that incorporates another work.
Œuvre qui intègre une autre œuvre.
Una obra que incorpora otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedInPartByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed in part by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that incorporates part of the content of another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that incorporates part of the content of another work.
Œuvre qui intègre une partie du contenu d’une autre œuvre.
Una obra que incorpora parte del contenido de otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionInPartOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption in part of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been partially incorporated into another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been partially incorporated into another work.
L’œuvre qui a été partiellement intégrée dans une autre œuvre.
Una obra que incorpora parte del contenido de otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been incorporated into another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been incorporated into another work.
L’œuvre qui a été intégrée dans une autre œuvre.
La obra que se ha incorporado en otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that abbreviates a source work in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that abbreviates a source work in a brief, objective manner.
Œuvre qui abrège l’œuvre source d’une manière brève et objective.
Una obra que abrevia la obra fuente en una manera breve y objetiva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is an abstracting and indexing service that abstracts the contents of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is an abstracting and indexing service that abstracts the contents of a source work.
Œuvre (service d’analyse et d’indexation) qui résume le contenu d’une œuvre source.
Una obra (un servicio de indización y resúmenes) que resume el contenido de una entidad fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstract of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.
Œuvre qui a été résumée analytiquement, c’est-à-dire abrégée d’une manière brève et objective.
Una obra que ha sido resumida, i.e., abreviada en una forma breve y objetiva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractsForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracts for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.
Œuvre dont le contenu a été résumé par un service d’analyse et d’indexation.
Una obra cuyo contenido ha sido resumido por un servicio de indización y resumenes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: academicDegree
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has academic degree
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a rank conferred as a guarantee of academic proficiency.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A rank conferred as a guarantee of academic proficiency.
Grade conféré garantissant un niveau universitaire.
Un rango conferido como garantía de capacidad acedémica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har akademisk grad

rdf:Description.reg:name: accompanyingWorkRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has accompanying work relationship with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by another work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Accompanying works include supplements, concordances, indexes, catalogues, teacher’s guides, music for a motion picture, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by another work.
Œuvre qui constitue une augmentation de l’œuvre ou qui est augmentée ou complétée par elle.
Una obra que es un aumento de, o se ve aumentada por, o se complementa con la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adaptation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies to changes in form or to works completely rewritten in the same form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
Œuvre qui a été modifiée pour une fin, une utilisation ou un mode d’expression autre que celui auquel elle était destinée à l’origine.
Una obra que ha sido modificada para un propósito, uso o medio diferente de los previstos originalmente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsChoreographyWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as choreography (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of movement based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of movement based on a source work.
Œuvre consistant en mouvement (par exemple, de la danse) basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra que consiste en movimiento (p. ej., danza) basada en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsGraphicNovelWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as graphic novel (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a graphic novel based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A graphic novel based on a source work.
Roman graphique basé sur l’œuvre source.
Una novela gráfica basada en la obra fuente

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsLibrettoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as libretto (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on a source work.
Œuvre qui consiste en le texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra que consiste en un texto de una ópera para representación musical o un oratorio, basada en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, based on a source work.
Œuvre consistant en le scénario pour un film, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra que consiste en un guión para una película cinematográfica, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a motion picture based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A motion picture based on a source work.
Film basé sur l’œuvre source.
Una película cinematográfica basada en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMusicalTheatreWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as musical theatre (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical theatre work based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical theatre work based on a source work.
Œuvre de théâtre musical basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra de teatro musical basada en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsNovelWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as novel (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a novel adapted from a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A novel adapted from a source work.
Roman adapté de l’œuvre source.
Una novela adaptada de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOperaWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as opera (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an opera based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An opera based on a source work.
Opéra basé sur l’œuvre source.
Una ópera basada en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOratorioWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as oratorio (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an oratorio based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An oratorio based on a source work.
Un oratorio basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a radio program based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A radio program based on a source work.
Émission de radio basée sur l’œuvre source.
Un programa de radio basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioScriptWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio script (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of a script for a radio program, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of a script for a radio program, based on a source work.
Œuvre consistant en le script d’une émission de radio, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra que consiste en el guión para un programa de radio, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on a source work.
Œuvre consistant en le scénario pour un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra que consiste en un guión para una película cinematrográfica, un programa de televisión o video, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a television program based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A television program based on a source work.
Émission de télévision basée sur l’œuvre source.
Un programa de televisión basado en la obra fuente

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of a screenplay for a television program, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of a screenplay for a television program, based on a source work.
Œuvre consistant en le scénario pour une émission de télévision, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra que consiste en un guión para un programa de televisión, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoGameWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video game (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a video game based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A video game based on a source work.
Jeu vidéo basé sur l’œuvre source.
Un video juego basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of a screenplay for a video, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of a screenplay for a video, based on a source work.
Œuvre consistant en le scénario pour une vidéo, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una obra que consiste en un guión para video, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a video based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A video based on a source work.
Vidéo basée sur l’œuvre source.
Un video basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that modifies a source work for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies to changes in form or to works completely rewritten in the same form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that modifies a source work for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
Œuvre qui modifie l’œuvre source pour une fin, une utilisation ou un mode d’expression autre que celui auquel elle était destinée à l’origine.
Una obra que modifica la obra fuente para un propósito, uso o medio diferente del previsto originalmente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedInVerseAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted in verse as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a literary composition in verse form adapted from a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A literary composition in verse form adapted from a source work.
Composition littéraire en vers adaptée de l’œuvre source.
Una composición literaria en verso adaptada de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose content is completed with brief content from another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose content is completed with brief content from another work.

Œuvre à laquelle sont ajoutées de brèves informations additionnelles, moins étendues qu’un supplément, mais essentielles à la complétude du contenu de l’œuvre ; ces informations sont généralement ajoutées à la fin de l’œuvre, mais peuvent aussi parfois être publiées séparément.

Una obra a la cual se añade material adicional breve, menos extenso que un suplemento, pero esencial para la integridad del contenido de la obra; generalmente se agrega al final de la obra, pero en algunos casos se publica separadamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of brief content that is essential for the completeness of another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of brief content that is essential for the completeness of another work.

Œuvre qui consiste en brèves informations additionnelles, moins étendues qu’un supplément, mais essentielles à la complétude du texte de l’œuvre prédominante ; ces informations sont généralement ajoutées à la fin du contenu, mais peuvent aussi parfois être publiées séparément.

Una obra que consiste en un material adicional breve, menos extenso que un suplemento, pero que es esencial para la integridad del texto de la obra principal; generalmente se agrega al final del contenido, pero que también puede publicarse en forma separada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addressee
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has addressee
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent to whom a work or part of a work is addressed.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent to whom a work or part of a work is addressed.
Personne, famille ou collectivité à qui une œuvre ou une partie d’œuvre est adressée.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa a quien va dirigida una obra o parte de ella

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysed in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that examines a source work to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that examines a source work to identify its components and their relations.
Œuvre qui examine l’œuvre source pour identifier ses composantes et leurs relations.
Una obra que examina la obra fuente para identificar sus componentes y sus relaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an expression that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
Expression qui a été examinée pour identifier ses composantes et leurs relations.
Una expresión que ha sido examinada para identificar sus componentes y sus relaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfItem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (item)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an item that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An item that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
Item qui a été examiné pour identifier ses composantes et leurs relations.
Un ítem que ha sido examinado para identificar sus componentes y sus relaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfManifestation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (manifestation)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a manifestation that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A manifestation that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
Manifestation qui a été examinée pour identifier ses composantes et leurs relations.
Una manifestación que ha sido examinada para identificar sus componentes y sus relaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysisOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysis of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been examined to identify its components and their relations.
Œuvre qui a été examinée pour identifier ses composantes et leurs relations.
Una obra que ha sido examinada para identificar sus componentes y sus relaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellant
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellant
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person or corporate body who appeals a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person or corporate body who appeals a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
Personne ou collectivité qui en appelle de la décision d’un tribunal inférieur.
Una persona o entidad corporativa que apela una decisión de una corte menor registrada en una obra jurídica de una corte superior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellantCorporateBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellant corporate body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a corporate body who appeals a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A corporate body who appeals a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
Collectivité qui en appelle de la décision d’un tribunal inférieur.
Una entidad corporativa que apela una decisión de una corte menor registrada en una obra jurídica de una corte superior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellantPerson
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellant person
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person who appeals a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person who appeals a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
Personne qui en appelle de la décision d’un tribunal inférieur.
Una persona que apela una decisión de una corte menor registrada en una obra jurídica de una corte superior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appellee
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellee
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person or corporate body against whom an appeal is taken on a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person or corporate body against whom an appeal is taken on a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
Personne ou collectivité contre laquelle un appel a été formé.
Una persona o entidad corporativa contra la cual se hace una apelación sobre una decisión de una corte menor registrada en una obra jurídica de una corte superior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appelleeCorporateBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellee corporate body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a corporate body against whom an appeal is taken on a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A corporate body against whom an appeal is taken on a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
Collectivité contre laquelle un appel a été formé.
Una entidad corporativa contra la cual se hace una apelación sobre una decisión de una corte menor registrada en una obra jurídica de una corte superior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appelleePerson
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has appellee person
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person against whom an appeal is taken on a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person against whom an appeal is taken on a decision of a lower court recorded in a legal work of a higher court.
Personne contre laquelle un appel a été formé.
Una persona contra la cual se hace una apelación sobre una decisión de una corte menor registrada en una obra jurídica de una corte superior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose content is augmented with content from another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose content is augmented with content from another work.

Œuvre qui est augmentée par une autre œuvre qui consiste en informations qui ne sont pas essentielles à la complétude du contenu, telles qu’une liste de références, des tableaux statistiques et des indications explicatives ; l’œuvre augmentante peut soit figurer à la fin du contenu, soit être publiée séparément.

Una obra aumentada por otra obra que consiste en material que no es esencial para la integridad del contenido, tal como una lista de referencias, tablas estadísticas y material explicativo; el material añadido puede venir al final del contenido o ser publicado separadamente.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Includes lists of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter that are not essential to the completeness of the content.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose content augments another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose content augments another work.

Œuvre qui forme une partie augmentante d’une autre œuvre et qui n’est pas essentielle à la complétude du contenu, telle qu’une liste de références, des tableaux statistiques et des indications explicatives ; elle peut soit figurer à la fin du contenu de l’œuvre prédominante, soit être publiée séparément.

Una obra que constituye una ampliación de otra obra y que no es esencial para la integridad del contenido, como una lista de referencias, tablas estadísticas, un tema explicativo; puede ser material que va al final del contenido de la obra principal, o que puede publicarse en forma separada.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Includes lists of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter that are not essential to the completeness of the content.

rdf:Description.reg:name: architect
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has architect
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating an architectural design, including a pictorial representation intended to show how a building, etc., will look when completed.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating an architectural design, including a pictorial representation intended to show how a building, etc., will look when completed.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable d’une création architecturale, y compris une représentation illustrée conçue pour montrer de quoi aura l’air un bâtiment, etc. une fois terminé.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de un diseño arquitectónico, incluyendo una representación pictórica. que muestra como se verá un edificio a su terminación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: artist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has artist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a work by conceiving, and often implementing, an original graphic design, drawing, painting, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a work by conceiving, and often implementing, an original graphic design, drawing, painting, etc.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une œuvre par la conception et souvent par la réalisation d’un graphisme, d’une peinture, d’un dessin, etc. original.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de una obra mediante la concepción, y a menudo la ejecución de un diseño gráfico, un dibujo, una pintura, etc. originales.

rdf:Description.reg:name: audioProducer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has audio producer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a producer responsible for most of the business aspects of an audio recording.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A producer responsible for most of the business aspects of an audio recording.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmentation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose content is added to by another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose content is added to by another work.
Œuvre dont le contenu est accru par une autre œuvre.
Una obra cuyo contenido se agrega a otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentedByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmented by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that adds to the content of a predominant work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that adds to the content of a predominant work.
Œuvre qui ajoute au contenu d’une œuvre prédominante.
Una obra que agrega al contenido de la obra principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: author
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has author
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a work that is primarily textual in content, regardless of media type or genre.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Creation of a new work by paraphrasing, rewriting, or adapting works by another creator, if the modification has substantially changed the nature and content of the original or changed the medium of expression, is included.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a work that is primarily textual in content, regardless of media type or genre.

Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une œuvre dont le contenu est principalement textuel quel que soit le type de média (par exemple, texte imprimé, parole énoncée, texte électronique, texte tactile) ou le genre (par exemple, poèmes, romans, scénarios, blogues).

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de contenido principalmente textual, independientemente del tipo de medios (por ej., texto impreso, palabra hablada, texto electrónico, texto táctil) o género (por ej., poemas, novelas, guiones, blogs).

rdf:Description.reg:name: basedOnWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is based on (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a source for a derivative work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a source for a derivative work.
Œuvre servant de source à une œuvre dérivée.
Una obra utilizada como fuente para una obra derivada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: bookArtist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has book artist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an artist responsible for creating art works that exploit the book form or alter its physical structure as part of the content.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An artist responsible for creating art works that exploit the book form or alter its physical structure as part of the content.
Artiste responsable de la création d’œuvres d’art qui exploitent la forme livre ou qui modifient sa structure physique comme partie du contenu de l’œuvre.
Un artista responsable por la creación de obras de arte que aprovechan la forma del libro o alteran su estructura física como parte del contenido de la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaComposedForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza composed for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.
Œuvre musicale telle qu’un concerto pour laquelle un passage ornemental pour soliste a été composé, soit par le même compositeur, soit par un compositeur différent.
Una obra musical como un concierto para el cual se compuso un pasaje ornamental para solista, por igual o diferente compositor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.
Œuvre musicale consistant en un passage ornemental pour soliste, ajouté à une œuvre musicale telle qu’un concerto, soit par le même compositeur, soit par un compositeur différent.
Una obra musical que consiste en un pasaje ornamental para solista, agregada a una obra musical como un concierto, por igual o diferente compositor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: calligrapher
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has calligrapher
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an artist responsible for creating a work of calligraphy where the focus of interest lies in the aesthetic value of its penmanship or graphic artistry, regardless of whether the same person, etc., also authored the inscribed text.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An artist responsible for creating a work of calligraphy where the focus of interest lies in the aesthetic value of its penmanship or graphic artistry, regardless of whether the same person, etc., also authored the inscribed text.

Artiste responsable de la création d’une œuvre de calligraphie où l’accent est mis sur la valeur esthétique de la calligraphie ou du graphisme, peu importe que la même personne, etc. soit aussi l’auteur du texte calligraphié.

Un artista responsable por la creación de una obra de caligrafía en la cual el foco de interés se centra en el valor estético de su escritura artística o gráfica, independiente de si la misma persona, etc., también es la autora del texto.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cartographer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has cartographer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a map, atlas, globe, or other cartographic work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a map, atlas, globe, or other cartographic work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une carte, d’un atlas, d’un globe ou d’une autre œuvre cartographique.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de un mapa, atlas, globo u otra obra cartográfica.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has casting director
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for most aspects of assigning parts and duties to performers.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for most aspects of assigning parts and duties to performers.
rdf:Description.reg:name: castingDirector
catalogueOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
Œuvre servant de base à un catalogue, c’est-à-dire une énumération complète des items classés systématiquement.
Una obra utilizada como base de un catálogo, i.e., una enumeración total de ítems ordenados sistemáticamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: catalogueWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
Œuvre qui consiste en une énumération complète des items classés systématiquement.
Una obra que contiene una enumeración completa de ítems ordenados sistemáticamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has choreographer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a work of movement.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a work of movement.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une œuvre de mouvement.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de una obra de movimiento.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographicAdaptationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreographic adaptation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement.
Œuvre qui a été adaptée en œuvre consistant en mouvement (par exemple, de la danse).
Una obra que ha sido adaptada como una obra que consiste en movimiento (p. ej., danza).

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses choreography of a related work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses choreography of a related work.
Œuvre qui utilise la chorégraphie de l’œuvre en relation.
Una obra que usa la coreografía de una obra relacionada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that provides choreography for use in a related work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that provides choreography for use in a related work.
Œuvre qui fournit la chorégraphie destinée à être utilisée dans l’œuvre en relation.
Una obra que proporciona la coreografía para una obra relacionada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commemoration
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has commemoration
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work created to commemorate a earlier work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work created to commemorate an earlier work.
Una obra conmemorada por otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commemorationOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commemoration of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work commemorated in a later work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work commemorated in a later work.
Una obra creada para conmemorar otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on a described work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on a described work
Œuvre qui contient un ensemble de notes explicatives ou critiques sur l’œuvre décrite.
Una obra que contiene un conjunto de notas explicativas o críticas sobre la obra descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnexpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an expression used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
Expression servant de base à un ensemble de notes explicatives ou critiques.
Una expresión usada como base para un conjunto de notas explicativas o críticas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnItem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (item)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an item used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An item used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
Item servant de base à un ensemble de notes explicatives ou critiques.
Un ítem usado como base para un conjunto de notas explicativas o críticas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnManifestation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (manifestation)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a manifestation used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A manifestation used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
Manifestation servant de base à un ensemble de notes explicatives ou critiques.
Una manifestación usada como base para un conjunto de notas explicativas o críticas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryOnWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary on (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a basis for a set of explanatory or critical notes.
Œuvre servant de base à un ensemble de notes explicatives ou critiques.
Una obra usada como base para un conjunto de notas explicativas o críticas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commissioningBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has commissioning body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for commissioning a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for commissioning a work.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la puesta en marcha de una obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: compiler
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has compiler
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a new work such as a bibliography or a directory by selecting, arranging, aggregating, and editing data, information, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a new work such as a bibliography or a directory by selecting, arranging, aggregating, and editing data, information, etc.

Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une nouvelle œuvre (par exemple, une bibliographie, un répertoire) en sélectionnant, en organisant, en regroupant et en éditant des données, de l’information, etc.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de una nueva obra (por ej., una bibliografía, un directorio) seleccionando, arreglando, agregando y editando datos, información, etc.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Revising or clarifying the content, or selecting and putting together works or parts of work, by one or more creators is excluded.

rdf:Description.reg:name: complementedByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is complemented by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work paired with another work without either work being considered to predominate.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work paired with another work without either work being considered to predominate.
Œuvre appariée à une autre œuvre sans qu’aucune des deux œuvres ne soit considérée comme prédominante.
Una obra emparejada con otra sin que ninguna se considere predominante.

rdf:Description.reg:name: composer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has composer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a musical work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a musical work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une œuvre musicale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de una obra musical.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Adaptation of another musical work to form a distinct alteration, paraphrasing a work or creating a work in the general style of another composer, or creating a work that is based on the music of another composer, is included.

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is concordance to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a basis for a concordance, i.e., an index of all the words in the predominant work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a basis for a concordance, i.e., an index of all the words in a predominant work.
Œuvre servant de base à une concordance, c’est-à-dire un index de tous les mots de l’œuvre prédominante.
Una obra utilizada como base de una concordancia, i.e., un índice de todas las palabras en la obra principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is concordance (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that consists of an index of all the words in a predominant work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that consists of an index of all the words in a predominant work.
Œuvre qui consiste en un index de tous les mots de l’œuvre prédominante.
Una obra que consiste en un indice de todas las palabras en la obra principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: consultant
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has consultant
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent who provides consultation services, and often makes recommendations, for another agent that is represented as the creator of a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent who provides consultation services, and often makes recommendations, for another agent that is represented as the creator of a work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité qui fournit des services de consultation et fait souvent des recommandations à une autre personne, famille ou collectivité représentée comme créatrice de l’œuvre.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que proporciona servicios de consultoría, y que a menudo hace recomendaciones, a otra persona, familia o entidad corporativa que es representada como el creador de una obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: containedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is contained in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a larger work of which a work is a discrete component.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A larger work of which a work is a discrete component.
Œuvre plus vaste dont l’œuvre est une composante distincte.
Una obra mayor de la cual una parte es un componente separado.

rdf:Description.reg:name: containerOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is container of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is a discrete component of a larger work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is a discrete component of a larger work.
Œuvre qui est une composante distincte d’une œuvre plus vaste.
Una obra que es un componente separado de una obra mayor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuationInPartOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continuation in part of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that split into two or more separate works with new titles.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that split into two or more separate works with new titles.
Œuvre qui s’est scindée en deux ou plusieurs œuvres distinctes avec de nouveaux titres.
Una obra que se divide en dos o más obras separadas con títulos nuevos.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continuation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is continued by the content of a later work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is continued by the content of a later work.
Œuvre qui est continuée par le contenu d’une œuvre ultérieure.
La obra que es continuada por el contenido de una obra posterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuedByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continued by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose content continues an earlier work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose content continues an earlier work.
Œuvre dont le contenu continue une œuvre antérieure.
Una obra cuyo contenido continúa una obra anterior bajo un título nuevo.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuedInPartByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continued in part by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work part of whose content separated from an earlier work to form a new work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work part of whose content separated from an earlier work to form a new work.
Œuvre dont une partie du contenu a été détachée d’une œuvre antérieure pour former une nouvelle œuvre.
Una obra de la cual parte de su contenido se separa de una obra anterior para formar una nueva obra.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: coordinatesOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has coordinates of cartographic content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a mathematical system for identifying an area covered by the cartographic content of a work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Coordinates may be expressed by means of longitude and latitude on the surface of planets or by the angles of right ascension and declination for celestial charts.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A mathematical system for identifying an area covered by the cartographic content of a work.
Système mathématique servant à identifier la région couverte par le contenu cartographique d’une ressource.
Un sistema matemático para la identificación del área incluida en el contenido cartográfico de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har koordinater (kartografiska resurser)

rdf:Description.reg:name: courtGoverned
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has court governed
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a court governed by court rules, regardless of their official nature.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A court governed by court rules, regardless of their official nature.
Tribunal régi par des règles de pratique, sans égard à leur nature officielle (par exemple, lois, règlements).
Un tribunal regido por reglamentos de tribunales, independientemente de su naturaleza oficial (por ej., leyes, disposiciones administrativas).

rdf:Description.reg:name: coverageOfContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has coverage of content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a chronological or geographic coverage of the content of a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A chronological or geographic coverage of the content of a work.
La couverture chronologique ou géographique du contenu d’une ressource.
La cobertura cronológica o geográfica del contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har innehållets täckning

rdf:Description.reg:name: creator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has creator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for the creation of a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for the creation of a work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une œuvre.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de una obra.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Creators include agents who are jointly responsible for the creation of a work either performing the same role, such as in a collaboration between two writers, or performing different roles, such as in a collaboration between a composer and a lyricist.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har skapare

rdf:Description.reg:name: critiquedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is critiqued in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that contains a critical evaluation of a described work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a critical evaluation of a described work.
Œuvre qui contient une évaluation critique de l’œuvre décrite.
Una obra que contiene una evaluación crítica de la obra descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: critiqueOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is critique of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an expression used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
Expression servant de base à une évaluation critique.
Una expresión usada como base para una evaluación crítica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: critiqueOfItem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is critique of (item)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an item used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An item used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
Item servant de base à une évaluation critique.
Un ítem usado como base para una evaluación crítica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: critiqueOfManifestation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is critique of (manifestation)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a manifestation used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A manifestation used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
Manifestation servant de base à une évaluation critique.
Una manifestación usada como base para una evaluación crítica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: critiqueOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is critique of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a basis for a critical evaluation.
Œuvre servant de base à une évaluation critique.
Una obra usada como base de una evaluación crítica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dateOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has date of work
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an earliest date associated with a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An earliest date associated with a work.
La date la plus ancienne associée à une œuvre.
La fecha más antigua asociada con una obra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har tid för verket

rdf:Description.reg:name: declination
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has declination
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an angular distance to a body on the celestial sphere measured north or south through 90° from the celestial equator along the hour circle of the body.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An angular distance to a body on the celestial sphere measured north or south through 90° from the celestial equator along the hour circle of the body.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dedicatee
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has dedicatee
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent to whom a work is dedicated.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent to whom a work is dedicated.
Personne, famille ou collectivité à qui une œuvre est dédiée.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa a la cual se dedicó una obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dedicator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has dedicator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent by whom a work is dedicated.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent by whom a work is dedicated.
Personne, famille ou collectivité par qui une œuvre est dédiée.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que dedica una obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: defendant
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has defendant
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person or corporate body who is accused in a criminal proceeding or sued in a civil proceeding.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person or corporate body who is accused in a criminal proceeding or sued in a civil proceeding.
Personne ou collectivité qui est accusée dans une poursuite criminelle ou contre laquelle une poursuite civile est intentée.

L’un des deux points d’intersection de l’écliptique et de l’équateur céleste, occupé par le soleil quand sa déclinaison est de 0°.

Una obra que guía al usuario en el uso de la obra principal, utilizando notas, ayudas de aprendizaje y estudio, ejercicios, problemas, preguntas y respuestas, materiales para el instructor o el estudiante, etc.
