rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent honoured by a work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité honorée par une œuvre (par exemple, une personne à qui sont offerts des mélanges).
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa en cuyo honor se realiza una obra (por ej., quien es objeto de una obra conmemorativa)

rdf:Description.reg:name: hostInstitution
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has host institution
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a corporate body hosting an event, exhibit, conference, etc., which gave rise to a work, but having little or no responsibility for the content.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A corporate body hosting the event, exhibit, conference, etc., which gave rise to a work, but having little or no responsibility for the content.
Collectivité accueillant l’événement, l’exposition, le congrès, etc. qui a donné lieu à la création d’une œuvre, mais qui a peu ou pas du tout de responsabilité quant au contenu de l’œuvre.
Una entidad corporativa que es sede de un evento, exposición, conferencia, etc., que da origen a la obra, pero que tiene poca o ninguna responsabilidad por el contenido de la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: identifierForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has identifier for work
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a character string uniquely associated with a work, or with a surrogate such as an authority record for a work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: The identifier serves to differentiate a work from other works.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A character string uniquely associated with a work, or with a surrogate such as an authority record for a work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: L’identifiant sert à distinguer cette œuvre d’autres œuvres.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Chaîne de caractères associée de manière unique à une œuvre ou à un substitut d’une œuvre (par exemple, une notice d’autorité).
Una cadena de caracteres asociada con una obra, o un substituto de una obra (p.ej., un registro de autoridad).

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrationsForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is illustrations for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is augmented by pictorial content designed to explain or decorate it.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is augmented by pictorial content designed to explain or decorate it.
Œuvre qui est augmentée par du contenu visuel destiné à l’expliquer ou à la décorer.
Una obra aumentada con contenido pictórico diseñado para explicarla o decorarla.

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrationsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is illustrations (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work consisting of pictorial content designed to explain or decorate an augmented work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work consisting of pictorial content designed to explain or decorate an augmented work.
Œuvre consistant en contenu visuel destiné à expliquer ou à décorer l’œuvre augmentée.
Una obra que consiste en contenido pictórico diseñado para explicar o decorar la obra aumentada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: imitatedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is imitated as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that copies the style or content of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that copies the style or content of a source work.
Œuvre qui copie le style ou le contenu de l’œuvre source.
Una obra que copia el estilo o contenido de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: imitationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is imitation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose style or content is copied in a derivative work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose style or content is copied in a derivative work.
Œuvre dont le style ou le contenu est copié dans une œuvre dérivée.
Una obra cuyo estilo o contenido se ha copiado en una obra derivada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: incidentalMusicForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is incidental music for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work such as a play or other spoken work for the stage that uses a musical work as incidental music.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work such as a play or other spoken work for the stage that uses a musical work as incidental music.
Œuvre telle qu’une pièce de théâtre ou une autre œuvre parlée pour la scène qui utilise l’œuvre musicale comme musique de scène.
Una obra tal como una obra de teatro u otra obra hablada para escenario que utiliza la obra musica como música incidental.

rdf:Description.reg:name: incidentalMusicWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is incidental music (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work that provides incidental music for a play or other spoken work for the stage.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work that provides incidental music for a play or other spoken work for the stage.
Œuvre musicale qui fournit la musique de scène pour une pièce de théâtre ou une autre œuvre parlée pour la scène.
Una obra musical que proporciona música incidental para una obra de teatro u otra obra hablada para el escenario.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is indexed in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is an abstracting and indexing service that indexes the contents of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is an abstracting and indexing service that indexes the contents of a source work.
Œuvre (service d’analyse et d’indexation) qui indexe le contenu de l’œuvre source.
Una obra (un servicio de indización y resúmenes) que indiza el contenido de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexingForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is indexing for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose contents have been indexed by an abstracting and indexing service.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose contents have been indexed by an abstracting and indexing service.
Œuvre dont le contenu a été indexé par un service d’analyse et d’indexation.
Una obra cuyo contenido ha sido indizado por un servicio de indización y resumenes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is index to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a basis for an index, i.e., a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant work, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a basis for an index, i.e., a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant work, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
Œuvre servant de base à un index, c’est-à-dire un guide méthodique et alphabétique du contenu de l’œuvre prédominante, renvoyant généralement à des numéros de page ou à d’autres codes de référence.
Una obra utilizada como base para un índice, i.e., una guía sistemática, alfabética al contenido de la obra principal, generalmente indicando los números de página u otros códigos de referencia.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is index (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that provides a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant work, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that provides a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant work, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
Œuvre qui fournit un guide méthodique et alphabétique du contenu de l’œuvre prédominante, renvoyant généralement à des numéros de page ou à d’autres codes de référence.
Una obra que proporciona una guía alfabética, sistemática, al contenido de la obra principal, generalmente indicando los números de página u otros códigos de referencia

rdf:Description.reg:name: inSeries
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is in series
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work in which a part has been issued; a title of the larger work appears on the part.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work in which a part has been issued; a title of a larger work appears on the part.
Œuvre dans laquelle la partie a été publiée ; le titre de l’œuvre plus vaste apparaît sur la partie.
Una obra en la cual se publica la parte; el título de la obra mayor aparece en la parte.

rdf:Description.reg:name: inspirationFor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is inspiration for
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work which was inspired by another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work which was inspired by another work.
Una obra que se inspira en otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: inspiredBy
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is inspired by
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work which serves as the inspiration for another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work which serves as the inspiration for another work.
Una obra que sirve de inspiración para otra obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: intendedAudience
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has intended audience
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a category of user for which the content of a work is intended, or for whom the content is considered suitable.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A category of user for which the content of a work is intended, or for whom the content is considered suitable.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: La classe d’utilisateurs est définie soit par tranche d’âge (par exemple, enfants, jeunes adultes, adultes), soit par niveau d’éducation (par exemple, primaire, secondaire), soit par type de handicap ou par toute autre catégorisation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: La classe d’utilisateurs à laquelle est destiné, ou supposé convenir, le contenu d’une ressource.
La clase de usuario a la cual va dirigido el contenido de un recurso, o para quienes el contenido se considera apropiado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har målgrupp

rdf:Description.reg:name: interviewee
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has interviewee
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a work by responding to an interviewer, usually a reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a work by responding to an interviewer, usually a reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une œuvre en répondant à un intervieweur, habituellement un journaliste, un sondeur ou un autre agent recueillant de l’information.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de una obra mediante respuestas a un entrevistador, generalmente un reportero, encuestador u otro agente recolector de información.

rdf:Description.reg:name: interviewer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has interviewer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a work by acting as an interviewer, reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a work by acting as an interviewer, reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’une œuvre en agissant à titre d’intervieweur, de journaliste, de sondeur ou d’autre agent recueillant de l’information.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de una obra actuando como un entrevistador, un reportero u otro agente recolector de información.

rdf:Description.reg:name: inventor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has inventor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent responsible for creating a new device or process.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for creating a new device or process.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la création d’un nouveau dispositif ou procédé.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la creación de un nuevo aparato o proceso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: issuingBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has issuing body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent issuing a work, such as an official organ of the body.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent issuing a work, such as an official organ of the body.
Personne, famille ou collectivité publiant une œuvre, tel un organe officiel de l’organisme.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que publica una obra, tal como el órgano oficial de una entidad.

rdf:Description.reg:name: judge
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has judge
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person who hears and decides on legal matters in court.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person who hears and decides on legal matters in court.
Personne qui entend des causes juridiques et rend jugement dans un tribunal.
Una persona que escucha y se pronuncia sobre materias legales en un tribunal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: jurisdictionGoverned
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has jurisdiction governed
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a jurisdiction governed by a law, regulation, etc., that was enacted by another jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A jurisdiction governed by a law, regulation, etc., that was enacted by another jurisdiction.
Juridiction régie par une loi, un règlement, etc. qui a été promulgué par une autre juridiction.
Una jurisdicción en la que se aplica una ley, disposición, etc., que fue promulgada por otra jurisdicción.

rdf:Description.reg:name: key
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has key
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a set of pitch relationships that establishes a tonal centre, or principal tonal centre, of a musical work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Key is indicated by its pitch name and its mode, when it is major or minor.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A set of pitch relationships that establishes the tonal centre, or principal tonal centre, of a musical work.
L’ensemble des rapports entre les hauteurs de sons qui détermine le centre tonal ou le principal centre tonal d’une œuvre musicale.
El conjunto de relaciones tonales que establece el centro tonal, o el centro tonal principal, de una obra musical.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har tonart

rdf:Description.reg:name: landscapeArchitect
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has landscape architect
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an architect responsible for creating landscape works.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An architect responsible for creating landscape works.
Architecte responsable de la création d’œuvres paysagères.
Un arquitecto responsable de la creación de obras paisajísticas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: latitude
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has latitude
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a distance of a point on a planet or satellite measured north and south from the equator.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A distance of a point on a planet or satellite measured north and south from the equator.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has librettist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an author of the words of an opera or other musical stage work, or an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An author of the words of an opera or other musical stage work, or an oratorio.
Auteur des paroles d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre scénique ou d’un oratorio.
Un autor de las palabras de una ópera u otra obra escénica musical, o de un oratorio.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Authoring of the words of just the songs from a musical is excluded.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoBasedOnWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto based on (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as the basis for the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
Œuvre servant de base au texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio.
Una obra utilizada como base para el texto de una ópera u otra obra para escenario musical o un oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work such as an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, that uses the text of a related work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work such as an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, that uses the text of a related work.
Œuvre musicale telle qu’un opéra ou une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou telle qu’un oratorio, qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre en relation comme livret.
Una obra musical tal como una ópera u otra obra para representación musical o un oratorio, que utiliza el texto de la obra relacionada como libreto.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that provides the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that provides the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
Œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio.
Una obra que proporciona el texto de una ópera u otra obra para representación musical, o un oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: longitude
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has longitude
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a distance of a point on a planet or satellite measured east and west from a reference meridian.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A distance of a point on a planet or satellite measured east and west from a reference meridian.

rdf:Description.reg:name: longitudeAndLatitude
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has longitude and latitude
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a system for identifying the area covered by the cartographic content of a work using longitude of the westernmost and easternmost boundaries and latitude of the northernmost and southernmost boundaries.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A system for identifying the area covered by the cartographic content of a work using longitude of the westernmost and easternmost boundaries and latitude of the northernmost and southernmost boundaries.
Système permettant d’identifier la surface couverte par le contenu cartographique d’une ressource en utilisant la longitude des limites ouest et est et la latitude des limites nord et sud.
Un sistema para identificar el área cubierta por el contenido cartográfico de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har longitud och latitud

rdf:Description.reg:name: lyricist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has lyricist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an author of the words of a popular song, including a song or songs from a musical.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An author of the words of a popular song, including a song or songs from a musical.
Auteur des paroles d’une chanson populaire, y compris une ou plusieurs chansons d’une comédie musicale.
Un autor de las palabras de una obra canción popular, incluyendo una canción o canciones de un musical.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Authoring of just the dialogue from a musical is excluded

rdf:Description.reg:name: manifestationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has manifestation of work
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a physical embodiment of a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A physical embodiment of a work.
Matérialisation d’une expression d’une œuvre.
La materialización física de una expresión de una obra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har manifestation av verk

rdf:Description.reg:name: medium
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has medium
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person held to be a channel of communication between the earthly world and a world of spirits.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person held to be a channel of communication between the earthly world and a world of spirits.
Personne tenue pour être un canal de communication entre le monde terrestre et le monde des esprits.
Una persona tenida como una canal de comunicación entre el mundo terrenal y el mundo de los espíritus.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mediumOfPerformance
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has medium of performance
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an instrument, voice, or ensemble for which a musical work was originally conceived.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An instrument, voice, and/or ensemble for which a musical work was originally conceived.
Le ou les instruments, la ou les voix, etc. auxquels une œuvre musicale est originellement destinée.
El instrumento, instrumentos, voz, voces, etc., para los cuales fue originalmente concebida una obra musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mergedToFormWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is merged to form (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work formed from the coming together of two or more works.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work formed from the coming together of two or more works.
Œuvre formée par l’assemblage de deux ou plusieurs œuvres.
Una obra formada the unión de dos o más obras.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mergerOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is merger of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that came together with one or more other works to form a new work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that came together with one or more other works to form a new work.
Œuvre qui s’est assemblée avec une ou plusieurs autres œuvres pour former la nouvelle œuvre.
Una obra que viene con una o más obras para formar la nueva obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: modifiedByVariationAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is modified by variation as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work in which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material taken from a source work forms a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work in which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material taken from a source work forms a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.

Œuvre musicale dans laquelle de la matière mélodique, thématique ou harmonique tirée de l’œuvre source forme un thème distinct qui est répété une ou plusieurs fois avec des modifications subséquentes.
Una obra musical en la cual el material melódico, temático o armónico de la obra fuente se toma para formar un tema separado, el cual se repite una o más veces con modificaciones subsecuentes

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureAdaptationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture adaptation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been adapted as a motion picture.
Œuvre qui a été adaptée en film.
Una obra que ha sido adaptada como película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureMusicWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture music (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a musical work that is used in a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A musical work that is used in a motion picture.
Œuvre musicale utilisée dans un film.
Una obra musical que es utlizada en una película cinematográfica

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureScreenplayBasedOnWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture screenplay based on (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture.
Œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour un film.
Una obra que ha sido adaptada como guión para una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureScreenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that provides text for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that provides text for a motion picture.
Œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un film.
Una obra que proporciona el texto para una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalSettingOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is musical setting of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that provides text for a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that provides text for a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio.
Œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une œuvre musicale non théâtrale, autre qu’un oratorio.
Una obra que proporciona el texto de una obra musical no dramática, diferente del oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalTheatreAdaptationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is musical theatre adaptation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as a musical theatre work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been adapted as a musical theatre work.
Œuvre qui a été adaptée en œuvre de théâtre musical.
Una obra que ha sido adaptada como una obra de teatro musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForMotionPictureWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for motion picture (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses a musical work in a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses a musical work in a motion picture.
Œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans un film.
Una obra que utiliza la obra musical en una película.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForRadioProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for radio program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses a musical work in a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses a musical work in a radio program.
Œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une émission de radio.
Una obra que utiliza la obra musical en un programa de radio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForTelevisionProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for television program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses a musical work in a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses a musical work in a television program.
Œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une émission de télévision.
Una obra que utliza la obra musical en un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForVideoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for video (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses a musical work in a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses a musical work in a video.
Œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une vidéo.

rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A serial number, opus number, or thematic index number assigned to a musical work by a composer, publisher, or a musicologist.
Numéro d’ordre, numéro d’opus ou numéro de catalogue thématique attribué à une œuvre musicale par un compositeur, un éditeur ou un musicologue.

rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Un número seriado, número de opus o número de índice temático, asignado a una obra musical por el compositor, el editor o un musicólogo.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: A numeric designation of a musical work includes a caption such as e.g., no., op., BWV, and it may include a numeral, a letter, a word, any other character, or the combination of these.

rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Agents to whom correspondence is addressed, agents honoured by a festschrift, directors, cinematographers, sponsoring bodies, production companies, institutions, etc., hosting an exhibition or event, etc., are included.

rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A characteristic other than form of work, date of work, or place of origin of the work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Elle sert à distinguer une œuvre d’une autre œuvre portant le même titre ou à la différencier du nom d’une personne, famille ou collectivité.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Caractéristique autre que la forme de l’œuvre, la date de l’œuvre ou le lieu d’origine de l’œuvre.

rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una característica distintiva de la forma de la obra, de la fecha de la obra o del lugar de origen de la obra.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: The identifier serves to differentiate a work from another work with the same title or from the name of an agent.

rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for most of the business aspects of a production for screen, sound recording, television, webcast, etc.

Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de la majeure partie des aspects financiers, techniques et artistiques de la production d’un film, d’un enregistrement audio, d’une émission de télévision, d’une webémission, etc.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de la mayor parte de los aspectos empresariales de la producción cinematográfica, grabación sonora, televisión, emisión web, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacedByWork

Œuvre ultérieure utilisée à la place d’une œuvre antérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’œuvre antérieure obsolète.
Una obra posterior usada en lugar de una obra anterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la obra anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacedInPartByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replaced in part by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a later work used in part in place of an earlier work, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes part of the earlier work obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A later work used in part in place of an earlier work, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes part of the earlier work obsolete.

Œuvre ultérieure utilisée en partie à la place d’une œuvre antérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend une partie de l’œuvre antérieure obsolète.
Una obra posterior usada en parte en lugar de una obra anterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta parte de la obra anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacementInPartOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replacement in part of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an earlier work whose content has been partially replaced by a later work, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier work obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An earlier work whose content has been partially replaced by a later work, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier work obsolete.

Œuvre antérieure dont le contenu a été partiellement remplacé par une œuvre ultérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’œuvre antérieure obsolète.

Una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado parcialmente por una obra posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la obra anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacementOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replacement of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an earlier work whose content has been replaced by a later work, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier work obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An earlier work whose content has been replaced by a later work, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier work obsolete.

Œuvre antérieure dont le contenu a été remplacé par une œuvre ultérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’œuvre antérieure obsolète.
Una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado por una obra posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la obra anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.

rdf:Description.reg:name: researcher
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has researcher
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent who does research in support of the creation of a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent who does research in support of the creation of a work.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que realiza la investigación de apoyo para la creación de una obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: respondent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has respondent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a candidate for a degree who defends or opposes a thesis provided by the praeses in an academic disputation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A candidate for a degree who defends or opposes a thesis provided by the praeses in an academic disputation.
Candidat à un diplôme universitaire qui défend ou réfute la thèse proposée par le praeses lors d’une soutenance de thèse.
Un candidato para un título que defiende o se opone a una tesis proporcionada por los moderadores académicos en un debate académico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: reviewedInWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is reviewed in (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that contains a brief evaluation of a described work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a brief evaluation of a described work.
Œuvre qui contient une brève évaluation de l’œuvre décrite.
Una obra que contiene una evaluación breve de la obra descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: reviewOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is review of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an expression used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
Expression servant de base à une brève évaluation.
Una expresión usada como base para una evaluación breve.

rdf:Description.reg:name: reviewOfItem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is review of (item)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an item used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An item used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
Item servant de base à une brève évaluation.
Un ítem usado como base para una evaluación breve.

rdf:Description.reg:name: reviewOfManifestation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is review of (manifestation)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a manifestation used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A manifestation used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
Manifestation servant de base à une brève évaluation.
Una manifestación usada como base para una evaluacion breve.

rdf:Description.reg:name: reviewOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is review of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a basis for a brief evaluation.
Œuvre servant de base à une brève évaluation.
Una obra que es usada como base para una evaluación breve.

rdf:Description.reg:name: rightAscension
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has right ascension
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an angular distance measured eastward on the equator from the vernal equinox to the hour circle through a celestial body, from 0 to 24 hours.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An angular distance measured eastward on the equator from the vernal equinox to the hour circle through a celestial body, from 0 to 24 hours.

rdf:Description.reg:name: rightAscensionAndDeclination
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has right ascension and declination
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a system for identifying the location of a celestial object in the sky covered by the cartographic content of a work using the angles of right ascension and declination.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A system for identifying the location of a celestial object in the sky covered by the cartographic content of a work using the angles of right ascension and declination.
Système utilisant les angles d’ascension droite et de déclinaison pour identifier la localisation d’un objet céleste dans la zone du ciel couverte par le contenu cartographique d’une ressource.

Un sistema para identificar la localización de un objeto celeste en el firmamento que está incluido en el contenido cartográfico de un recurso que utiliza los ángulos de ascensión directa y de declinación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har rektascension och deklination

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayBasedOnWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay based on (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video.
Œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo.
Una obra que ha sido adaptada como guión para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o vídeo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForTheMotionPictureWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for motion picture (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses the text as a screenplay for a motion picture.
Œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’un film.
Una obra que utiliza el texto como guión para una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForTheTelevisionProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for television program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses the text as a screenplay for a television program.
Œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’une émission de télévision.
Una obra que utiliza el texto como guión para un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForTheVideoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for video (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses the text as a screenplay for a video.
Œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’une vidéo.
Una obra que utiliza el texto como guión para un vídeo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work such as a motion picture, television program, or video, that uses the text of a work as a screenplay.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work such as a motion picture, television program, or video, that uses the text of a work as a screenplay.
Œuvre telle qu’un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre comme scénario.
Una obra tal como una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o vídeo, que utiliza el texto de la obra como guión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that provides text for a motion picture, television program or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that provides text for a motion picture, television program or video.
Œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un film, d’une émission de télévision ou d’une vidéo.
Una obra que proporciona el texto para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenwriter
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has screenwriter
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an author of a screenplay, script, or scene.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An author of a screenplay, script, or scene.
Auteur d’un scénario, d’un script ou d’une scène.
Un autor de un guión o escena.

rdf:Description.reg:name: scriptForTheRadioProgramWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is script for radio program (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that uses the text as a script for a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that uses the text as a script for a radio program.
Œuvre qui utilise le texte comme script d’une émission de radio.
Una obra que utiliza el texto como guión para un programa de radio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sculptor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sculptor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an artist responsible for creating a three-dimensional work by modeling, carving, or similar technique.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An artist responsible for creating a three-dimensional work by modeling, carving, or similar technique.
Artiste responsable de la création d’une œuvre tridimensionnelle par le modelage, la taille ou une technique similaire.
Un artista responsable de la creación de una obra tridimensional mediante modelado, tallado o técnica similar.

rdf:Description.reg:name: separatedFromWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is separated from (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that spun off a part of its content to form a new work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that spun off a part of its content to form a new work.
Œuvre dont une partie du contenu a été détachée pour former une nouvelle œuvre.
Una obra que se desprende de una parte de su contenido para formar una obra nueva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sequel
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is sequel
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a later work that continues the narrative of an earlier work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A later work that continues the narrative of an earlier work.
Œuvre ultérieure qui continue le récit d’une œuvre antérieure.
Una obra posterior que continúa la narración de una obra anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sequelTo
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is sequel to
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work whose narrative is continued by a later work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work whose narrative is continued by a later work.
L’œuvre dont le récit est continué par l’œuvre ultérieure.
La obra cuya narración se continúa en una obra posterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sequentialWorkRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sequential work relationship with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is preceded by or succeeded by another work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Sequential works include sequels, prequels, continuations, superseding works, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is preceded by or succeeded by another work.
Œuvre qui est précédée ou suivie par l’œuvre.
Una obra que es precedido por o sucedida por la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: seriesContainerOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is series container of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been issued as part of a series.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been issued as part of a series.
Œuvre qui a été publiée comme partie d’une collection.
Una obra que se publicó como parte de una serie.

rdf:Description.reg:name: setToMusicAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is set to music as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio, that uses the text of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio, that uses the text of a source work.
Œuvre musicale non théâtrale, autre qu’un oratorio, qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre source.
Una obra musical no dramática, diferente del oratorio, que usa el texto de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: splitIntoWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is split into (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work resulting from division of an earlier work into two or more separate works.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work resulting from division of an earlier work into two or more separate works.
L’une de deux ou plusieurs œuvres résultant de la division d’une œuvre antérieure en œuvres séparées.
Una de dos o más obras que resultan de la división de una obra anterior en obras separadas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sponsoringBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sponsoring body
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent sponsoring some aspect of a work, such as funding research or sponsoring an event.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent sponsoring some aspect of a work, such as funding research or sponsoring an event.
Personne, famille ou collectivité commanditant certains aspects d’une œuvre, par exemple, le financement de la recherche, le parrainage d’un événement.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que patrocina algún aspecto de una obra, por ej., financiando una investigación, patrocinando un evento.

rdf:Description.reg:name: stringsOfCoordinatePairs
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has strings of coordinate pairs
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a system for identifying the precise area covered by the cartographic content of a work using coordinates for each vertex of a polygon.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A system for identifying the precise area covered by the cartographic content of a work using coordinates for each vertex of a polygon.
Système pour identifier la zone précise couverte par le contenu cartographique d’une ressource en utilisant des coordonnées pour chaque sommet d’un polygone.
Un sistema para identificar el área precisa incluida en el contenido cartográfico de un recurso utilizando coordenadas para cada vértice de un polígono.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectAgent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (agent)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an agent that a work is about.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectCollectiveAgent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (collective agent)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a collective agent that a work is about.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectCorporateBody
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (corporate body)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a corporate body that a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A corporate body that a work is about.
Una entidad corporativa sobre la que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectEntity
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (entity)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an entity that a work is about.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an expression that a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression that a work is about.
Una expresión sobre la que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectFamily
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (family)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a family that a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A family that a work is about.
Una familia sobre la que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectItem
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (item)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to an item that a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An item that a work is about.
Un ítem sobre el que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectManifestation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (manifestation)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a manifestation that a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A manifestation that a work is about.
Una manifestación sobre la que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectNomen
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (nomen)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a nomen that a work is about.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is subject of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is about a work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is about a work.
Una obra de una obra sobre la que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectPerson
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (person)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a person that a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person that a work is about.
Una persona sobre la que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectPlace
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (place)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a place that a work is about.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject relationship
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a term, phrase, classification number, etc., that indicates what a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A relationship between a work and an identifier, an authorized access point, or a description that indicates what a work is about.
La relación entre una obra y un identificador, un punto de acceso autorizado y/o una descripción que indica de que trata la obra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har ämnesrelation

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectRelationshipOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is subject relationship of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an entity to a work that is about an entity.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is about an entity.
Una obra que trata sobre la entidad.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectTimespan
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (time-span)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a time-span that a work is about.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has subject (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that a work is about.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that a work is about.
Una obra sobre la que trata la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subseries
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is subseries
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a serial or multipart work that consistently appears in a larger work; a title of a larger work appears on all issues or parts of a subseries
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A serial or multipart work that consistently appears in a larger work; a title of a larger work appears on all issues or parts of a subseries.

Publication en série ou œuvre en plusieurs parties qui apparaît régulièrement dans une œuvre plus vaste ; le titre de l’œuvre plus vaste apparaît sur toutes les livraisons ou parties de la sous-collection.
Una serie u obra en varias partes que aparece constantemente en conjunto con otra serie generalmente más amplia; el título de la obra más amplia aparece en todos los números o partes de la subserie.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subseriesOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is subseries of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work in which a part consistently appears; a title of a larger work appears on all issues or parts of a subseries.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work in which a part consistently appears; a title of a larger work appears on all issues or parts of a subseries.
Œuvre dans laquelle la partie apparaît régulièrement ; le titre de l’œuvre plus vaste apparaît sur toutes les livraisons ou parties de la sous-collection.
Una obra en la que la parte aparece en forma consistente; el título de la obra mayor aparece en todas las entregas o partes de la subserie.

rdf:Description.reg:name: succeededByWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is succeeded by (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that succeeds, that is, is later in time or after in a narrative, etc., a preceding work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that succeeds, that is, is later in time or after in a narrative, etc., a preceding work.
Œuvre qui succède à l’œuvre précédente (par exemple, qui lui est ultérieure dans le temps ou dans un récit).
Una obra que reemplaza (por ej., más tarde en el tiempo o después en una narración) la obra anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: summarizedAsWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is summarized as (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that consists of a brief recapitulation of the content of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that consists of a brief recapitulation of the content of a source work.
Œuvre qui consiste en une brève récapitulation du contenu de l’œuvre source.
Una obra que contiene una recapitulación breve del contenido de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: summaryOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is summary of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work used as a basis for a brief recapitulation of its content.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work used as a basis for a brief recapitulation of its content.
Œuvre servant de base à une brève récapitulation de son contenu.
Una obra utilizada como base para una recapitulación breve de su contenido.

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementToWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is supplement to (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that is updated or otherwise complemented by an augmenting work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is updated or otherwise complemented by an augmenting work.
Œuvre qui est mise à jour ou complétée d’une autre façon par l’œuvre augmentante.
Una obra que se actualiza o complementa aumentando la obra principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is supplement (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that updates or otherwise complements a predominant work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that updates or otherwise complements a predominant work.
Œuvre qui met à jour ou complète d’une autre façon l’œuvre prédominante.
Una obra que actualiza o complementa la obra predominante.

rdf:Description.reg:name: systemOfOrganization
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has system of organization
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a system of arranging materials in an archival resource or a collection.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A system of arranging materials in an archival resource or a collection.
Système de classement des éléments matériels d’une ressource archivistique ou d’une collection.
Un sistema de arreglo de los materiales dentro de un recurso de archivo o de una colección.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har arkivstruktur

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionAdaptationOfWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television adaptation of (work)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a work that has been adapted as a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that has been adapted as a television program.
Œuvre qui a été adaptée en émission de télévision.
Una obra que ha sido adaptada como programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionDirector
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has television director
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a director responsible for the general management and supervision of a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A director responsible for the general management and supervision of a television program.
Réalisateur responsable de la gestion et de la supervision générales d’une émission de télévision.
Un director responsable por la dirección y supervisión general de un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionProducer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has television producer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a producer responsible for most of the business aspects of a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A producer responsible for most of the business aspects of a television program.
Producteur responsable de la majeure partie des aspects financiers, techniques et artistiques d’une émission de télévision.
Un productor responsable de la mayor parte de los aspectos empresariales relacionados con un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionProgramMusicWork

rdf:Description.reg:name: variantTitleForWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has variant title for work
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a work to a title or form of title by which a work is known that differs from a title or form of title chosen as a preferred title for the work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A title or form of title by which a work is known that differs from a title or form of title chosen as a preferred title for the work.
Titre ou forme de titre sous laquelle une œuvre est connue et qui diffère du titre ou de la forme de titre choisie comme titre privilégié de l’œuvre.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: variante de título de una obra
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Un título o una forma del título, por la que se conoce una obra que difiere del título o de la forma del título elegida como el título preferido de la obra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har varianttitel för verket
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Variant title for work includes a title or form of title appearing on a manifestation of the work or found in reference sources, a title resulting from a different transliteration of a title, etc.

Œuvre musicale d’où est tirée de la matière mélodique, thématique ou harmonique pour former un thème distinct, qui est répété une ou plusieurs fois avec des modifications subséquentes.
Una obra musical de la cual se toma material melódico, temático o armónico para formar un tema separado, que se repite una o más veces con modificaciones subsecuentes.
